verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13287'>قْ</tajweed>سِمُ بِهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14500'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: Клянусь сим городом

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3893'>نت</tajweed>َ حِل<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':14501'>ُّۢ ب</tajweed>ِهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14500'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: В котором ты живешь

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَوَالِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14502'>دٍ و</tajweed>َمَا وَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>َ
verses.translation: Родителем и тем, что породил он

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2389'>دْ</tajweed> خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5159'>قْ</tajweed>نَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7228'>ٱ</tajweed>لْإِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5969'>نس</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ فِى كَبَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: Мы человека создали на тяготы (земные)

verses.text_uthmani: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَيَحْسَبُ أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':8842'>َن ل</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14503'>َن ي</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14504'>قْ</tajweed>دِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.translation: Так неужели он воображает, Что здесь над ним никто не властен

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَال<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14505'>اً ل</tajweed>ُّبَدًا
verses.translation: Он может говорить: "Я заплатил за все сполна

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَيَحْسَبُ أ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4423'>َن ل</tajweed>َّمْ يَرَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَحَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٌ
verses.translation: Ужель он думает, никто его не видит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8219'>جْ</tajweed>عَل لَّهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> عَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>يْ</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И разве не дано ему двух глаз

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلِسَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14506'>نًا و</tajweed>َشَفَتَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>يْ</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И языка, и пары губ

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَهَدَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14507'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14508'>جْ</tajweed>دَ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>يْ</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: И не указаны два главных направленья (Добра и Зла)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14509'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14510'>قْ</tajweed>تَحَمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14511'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: Но не спешит избрать стезю крутую человек

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13858'>دْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14512'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: Как объяснить тебе, что значит "крутизна

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Освободить раба

verses.text_uthmani: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوْ إِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14513'>طْ</tajweed>عَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14514'>مٌ ف</tajweed>ِى يَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14515'>مٍ ذ</tajweed>ِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Au iṭ'āmun fī yaumin żī masgabah(tin).
verses.translation: Дать пищу в дни лишений

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَتِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14516'>مًا ذ</tajweed>َا مَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':14517'>قْ</tajweed>رَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Сироте, который близок вам по крови

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوْ مِسْكِي<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14518'>نًا ذ</tajweed>َا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Иль бедняку, презренному другими

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ كَانَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':523'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَتَوَاصَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':223'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':223'>بْ</tajweed>رِ وَتَوَاصَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14519'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Ṡumma kāna minal-lażīna āmanū wa tawāṣau biṣ-ṣabri wa tawāṣau bil-marḥamah(ti).
verses.translation: И вот тогда вы станете одним из тех, Кто верит (в Бога), и смиренно сострадает, И с милосердием творит добро

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13209'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Таков лик праведных - стоящих По праву сторону в День Судный

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِـَٔـايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13211'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَشْــَٔمَةِ
verses.translation: Но тем, кто Наши ясные знамения отверг, Почить на левой стороне

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَيْهِمْ نَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14520'>رٌ م</tajweed>ُّؤْصَدَةُۢ
verses.translation: Под сводом пламенным Огня
